meanings.definition: A baked dish consisting of a pastry crust filled with meat and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious potpies for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells different types of potpies every day.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the potpies on the floor, what a mess!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked potpies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the potpies was perfectly flaky and crispy.

meanings.sent1: We ordered two potpies for lunch from the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The potpies were a hit at the potluck dinner.
meanings.sent3: The potpies in the oven smelled so good, I couldn't wait to eat them.
meanings.sent4: The potpies on the table looked like little golden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The warm potpies were a comforting meal on a cold winter evening.
